name: No Discounts
desc: The wares on Peddler are 20% more expensive.

name: Inferior Magazine
desc: Magazine capacity -20%.

name: Elemental Curse
desc: Exponentially decrease the chance of inflicting elemental effect by weapons.

name: Cateye Sight
desc: -1x Weapon CritX.

name: Old Belt
desc: Ammo capacity -20%.

name: Old Battle Boots
desc: +100% DMG taken from Traps and -10% Movement Speed.

name: Cursed Magazine
desc: When reloading, there is a 33% chance to double the ammo consumption.

name: Broken Bullet
desc: -20% DMG to Shield/Armor.

name: Fragile Body
desc: -0.25% DMG Resistance for each 1% HP missing.

name: Arms Trafficker
desc: Weapon upgrades cost much more.

name: Clumsy Throw
desc: When using the secondary skill, its consumption has a 50% chance to increase by 1.

name: Moldy Bun
desc: Recover random HP when obtaining buns.

name: Broken Gun
desc: 15% chance to cause only 1 DMG upon hitting an enemy.

name: Sabotaged Magazine
desc: 20% chance of losing 1 additional ammo in magazine for each shot.

name: Cowardly Bully
desc: -30% DMG to Elite monsters.

name: Heavy Burden
desc: The higher the Max HP and Max shield/armor are, the lower the movement speed is. (Decrease up to 20%)

name: Cautious Shot
desc: Every missing shot causes 1 DMG to yourself. This effect will not knock you down.

name: Quack Doctor
desc: +30% revive time when reviving teammates.

name: Stubborn Stance
desc: Unable to pick up shared Occult Scrolls from teammates or share Occult Scrolls with teammates.

name: Shared Adversity
desc: When a teammate acquired a Cursed Scroll, there is a 50% chance to have the same scroll.

name: Burden of Solitude
desc: Takes DMG equal to 50% of your max HP every 15s if there are no teammates within a 15m radius. This damage will not knock you down.

name: Struggle for Independence
desc: -15% final DMG if there are no teammates within a 15m radius.

name: Deflection Shield
desc: -90% DMG taken from enemies 15 meters away; +90% DMG taken from enemies within 15 meters.
descEnhanced: -90% DMG taken from enemies 15 meters away and +90% DMG taken from enemies within 15 meters when holding weapon #1. -90% DMG taken from enemies within 15 meters and +90% DMG taken from enemies 15 meters away when holding weapon #2.

name: Elemental Power
desc: +25% Elemental DMG; When triggering Elemental Effect, it will be passed to a nearby random enemy.
descEnhanced: +25% Elemental DMG; When triggering Elemental Effect, it will also affect all nearby enemies within 5m of the target.

name: Hawkeye Sight
desc: +2.0x CritX; however, -50% weapon DMG when not triggering a Crit Hit. Weapons with a Scope gain 2x zoom.
descEnhanced: +2x CritX for all weapons. Weapons with a scope gain 2x zoom.

name: Mystic Mirror
desc: Alternate between "Yin" state and "Yang" state every 12s. The "Yin" state offers +20% DMG Resistance and "Yang" state grants +50% DMG Dealt.
descEnhanced: Apply Yang status to yourself after dealing DMG to an enemy, which grants +50% weapon & skill DMG for 12s. Apply Yin status to yourself after taking DMG, which grants +20% DMG Resistance for 12s.

name: Dual-edge
desc: Gain 1% DMG dealt and -0.2% DMG Resistance for each enemy you defeat.
descEnhanced: Gain 1% DMG dealt and -0.2% DMG Resistance (up to -20% DMG Resistance) for each enemy you defeat.

name: Deadly Counter
desc: After taking damage, all hits will become Crit Hits within 3s.
descEnhanced: After taking damage, all hits will become Crit Hits within 6s.

name: Gold Medal
desc: Recover 15% Max Shield/Armor when you use Primary Skill or Dash.
descEnhanced: Recover 15% Max Shield/Armor when you use Primary Skill, Secondary Skill or Dash.

name: Spirit Feline
desc: -100% DMG Resistance, but DMG taken from each hit won't exceed 14% of total max HP.
descEnhanced: -100% DMG Resistance, but DMG taken from each hit won't exceed 11% of total max HP.

name: Deadly Curse
desc: +75% weapon DMG and skill DMG; -75% Max HP.
descEnhanced: +75% weapon DMG and skill DMG; -2% HP every second when your HP is greater than 25% of your max HP.

name: Penetration Bullet
desc: Crits deal 50% DMG directly to enemy's HP rather than Shield or Armor.
descEnhanced: Crit hits deal full DMG directly to enemy's HP rather than Shield/Armor.

name: Unfettered Will
desc: +2% weapon DMG for every 100 copper you currently have.
descEnhanced: +4% weapon DMG for every 100 copper you currently have.

name: Lightless Shield
desc: Gain 3 stacks of Lightless Shield every 30s. Each stack negates incoming DMG and is consumed afterwards. You can only have up to 3 stacks at any given time.
descEnhanced: Gain 4 stacks of Lightless Shield every 30s. Each stack negates incoming DMG and is consumed afterwards. You can only have up to 4 stacks at any given time.

name: Phantom Skin
desc: Gain 1 stack of Phantom Skin every 10s. A stack is consumed whenever you take DMG, restoring 30% of your Shield/Armor. You can only have up to 3 stacks of Phantom Skin at any given time.
descEnhanced: Gain 1 stack of Phantom Skin every 10s. A stack is consumed whenever you take DMG, restoring 100% of your Shield/Armor. You can only have up to 3 stacks of Phantom Skin at any given time.

name: Flowing Time
desc: -1s for all remaining cooldowns on hit (triggered once every 2s).
descEnhanced: -1s for all remaining cooldowns on hit (triggered once every 1s).

name: Advanced Depot
desc: Use reserve ammo first rather than magazine when shooting. There is a 50% chance to consume double ammo.
descEnhanced: Use reserve ammo first rather than magazine when shooting.

name: Speedy Pursuit
desc: +50% Lucky Shot Chance for 2s after dashing.
descEnhanced: +50% Lucky Shot Chance for 2s after dashing; -1s Dash cooldown after inflicting a lucky shot.

name: Merciless Strike
desc: +50% Lucky Shot Chance on Crit Hit, -50% Lucky Shot Chance on Normal Hit.
descEnhanced: +50% Lucky Shot Chance on a Crit Hit; +0.5x CritX on a Lucky Shot.

name: Heavy Shield
desc: When hit by enemies, -10% Movement Speed for 10s. 40% chance to immune to all DMG (25% from Elite and Boss).
descEnhanced: When hit by enemies, 50% chance to immune to all DMG (30% from Elite and Boss).

name: Backup Shield
desc: Recover 40% Shield/Armor instantly when the shield/armor is broken. (Cooldown: 10s)
descEnhanced: Recover 100% Shield/Armor instantly when the shield/armor is broken. (Cooldown: 5s)

name: Airbag
desc: -4% HP per second when your Shield/Armor is full. Recover 100% HP and negate excess DMG when your Shield/Armor gets fully broken.
descEnhanced: -4% HP per second when your Shield/Armor is more than 0. Recover 100% HP and negate excess DMG when your Shield/Armor gets broken.

name: Merciless Combo
desc: +15% weapon DMG for 2s whenever hitting the enemy (Can be stacked up to 50 times).
descEnhanced: +15% weapon DMG for 3s whenever hitting the enemy (Can be stacked up to 50 times).

name: Fish or Bear Paw
desc: When shooting, there is a 100% chance (reduced by 3.5% per projectile) to deal -50% Total DMG but deal extra DMG once.
descEnhanced: When shooting, there is a 100% chance (reduced by 3.5% per projectile) to deal -20% Total DMG but deal extra DMG once.

name: Energy Storage
desc: Primary Skill Capacity +1, but cooldown +30% (cannot be discarded).
descEnhanced: Primary Skill Capacity +2 (cannot be discarded).

name: Stone Skin
desc: +30% DMG Resistance for 3s upon taking DMG. (Does not stack)
descEnhanced: +30% DMG Resistance 3 times after taking DMG. (Un-stackable)

name: Premium Membership
desc: Whenever you spend copper, gain 30% of it back.
descEnhanced: Whenever you spend copper, there is a 25% chance to gain 100% copper consumed back, and a 75% chance to gain 30% copper consumed back.

name: Spirit Bible
desc: +120% Skill DMG.
descEnhanced: +120% Skill DMG, and for every Occult Scroll you own, +3% Skill DMG.

name: Elemental Magazine
desc: Deals an additional 50% DMG when Weapon DMG causes an elemental effect.
descEnhanced: Deals an additional 50% DMG when Weapon DMG causes an elemental effect/Crit Hit/Lucky Shot.

name: Reasonable Luck
desc: +80% Lucky Shot Chance. But total Lucky Shot Chance won't exceed 150%.
descEnhanced: +80% Lucky Shot Chance.

name: Rich's Privileges
desc: Every time your skill deals DMG, it will inflict additional skill DMG based on how much copper you currently own. (For each enemy, the additional skill DMG occurs up to 1 time every 3s.)
descEnhanced: Every time your skill deals DMG, it will inflict additional skill DMG based on how much copper you currently own. (For each enemy, the additional skill DMG occurs up to 1 time every 2s.)

name: Overwhelming Shield
desc: Shield recovery will not be stopped but -50% Recovery Speed.
descEnhanced: Shield recovery will not be stopped but -25% Recovery Speed.

name: Break the Ice
desc: - Lv1 on a random Ascension, and gain 5 Occult Scrolls. (At least 1 Legend Scroll)
descEnhanced: - Lv1 on a random Ascension, and gain 5 Occult Scrolls. (At least 3 Legend Scroll)

name: Extravagant Consumption
desc: +1% All DMG for every 100 copper spent. If you bring over 500 copper to the next stage, the excessive part will be spent automatically.
descEnhanced: +1% All DMG for every 100 copper spent in the entire run. If you bring over 500 copper to the next stage, the excessive part will be spent automatically.

name: Iron Circuit
desc: +25% DMG Resistance. +5% additional DMG Resistance for each teammate carrying the [Iron Circuit]. When taking DMG, teammates carrying [Iron Circuit] will share 30% of the final DMG. This damage will not knock the teammate down. (CD: 5s)
descEnhanced: +25% DMG Resistance, and +5% additional DMG Resistance for having one teammate. When taking DMG, teammates carrying [Iron Circuit] will share 30% of the total DMG. This damage will not knock the teammate down. (CD: 5s) Reduces the DMG from [Iron Circuit] taken by yourself to 0.

name: Explosive Magazine
desc: Reloading deals current Weapon DMG to enemies within an 8m radius. For every 0.5s spent reloading, an additional DMG is dealt. (CD: 3s)
descEnhanced: Reloading deals current Weapon DMG to enemies within an 8m radius. An additional DMG is dealt for every 0.5s spent reloading, and another additional DMG is dealt when reloading is completed. (CD: 3s)

name: Masterful Craftsmanship
desc: Acquired weapons always have 2 Exclusive Inscriptions. The maximum number of Exclusive Inscriptions is fixed at 2, and the total Inscription upper limit is fixed at 4 (cannot be discarded).
descEnhanced: Acquired weapons have a minimum of 2 Exclusive Inscriptions (cannot be discarded).

name: Convergent Paths
desc: After using a Weapon Skill, +40% Weapon DMG and -25% Skill DMG for 10s. After using the primary skill, +50% Skill DMG and -20% Weapon DMG for 10s. When both effects are active at the same time, the buff effect is doubled, and the debuff effect is removed.
descEnhanced: After using the Weapon Skill, +80% Weapon DMG for 10s. After using the primary skill, +80% Skill DMG for 10s.

name: Brutal Gloves
desc: +35% Weapon/Skill DMG to non Crit-Hits.
descEnhanced: +50% weapon DMG and skill DMG.

name: On the House
desc: Your first purchase at any Peddler does not cost any copper.
descEnhanced: Your first purchase at any Peddler does not cost any copper; A random item at the Spiritual Remnant & Phantom Peddler does not cost any soul essence.

name: Perfect Sixth
desc: Every sixth shot gains +80% DMG (Count is reset when reloading).
descEnhanced: Every sixth shot gains +160% DMG.

name: Improved Clip
desc: Whenever an ammo pack is picked up, it directly refills the magazine instead of reserve ammo, and increases your Movement Speed by 25% until next reload.
descEnhanced: Whenever an ammo pack is picked up, it directly refills the magazine instead of reserve ammo, and increases your Movement Speed by 25% and Weapon DMG by 50% until next reload.

name: Preemptive Strike
desc: +50% Weapon DMG if magazine is full.
descEnhanced: +60% weapon DMG for the first 30% ammo in the magazine, including the first shot.

name: Bluff
desc: +25% DMG Dealt when your HP is full.
descEnhanced: +50% DMG Dealt when your HP is full.

name: Resolute
desc: +50% Movement Speed and +50% DMG when your Shield/Armor is 0. +300% shield rest time before recharging.
descEnhanced: +50% Movement Speed and +50% DMG for at least 10s when your Shield/Armor is 0.

name: Elemental Relic
desc: +5% Elemental DMG for 10s whenever you kill an enemy affected by Elemental Effect.
descEnhanced: +5% Elemental DMG & +5% Elemental Effect Chance for 10s whenever you kill an enemy affected by Elemental Effect.

name: Elemental Bestowment
desc: Recover 1% Max HP and 5 ammo of the currently used weapon whenever you deal Elemental Effect to enemies. (CD: 1s)
descEnhanced: Recover 1% Max HP, 1% Shield/Armor and 5 ammo directly to the magazine whenever you deal Elemental Effect to enemies. (CD: 1s)

name: Double Exhilaration
desc: Secondary skill Capacity gets doubled.
descEnhanced: Secondary Skill Capacity gets doubled, and there's a 50% chance to not consume any use upon using secondary skill.

name: Terminal Lucidity
desc: Reset the cooldown of all skills when you lose over 20% Total Max HP in a single hit (CD: 2s).
descEnhanced: Reset the cooldown of all skills and temporarily gain 1 Primary Skill charge (cannot not be stacked), when you lose over 20% Total Max HP in a single hit (CD: 2s).

name: Elemental Cube
desc: A random element will be selected after reloading. Increase corresponding elemental DMG by 50%.
descEnhanced: +50% elemental DMG and doubles the elemental effect chance for 2 random elements. The elements change on reload.

name: Devil's Covenant
desc: -50% Max HP, +50% copper gained with this scroll.
descEnhanced: +50% copper gained with this scroll.

name: Ammo Belt
desc: Ammo Capacity gets doubled.
descEnhanced: +150% Ammo Capacity.

name: Snow Boots
desc: Gain immunity to the Slows and -50% DMG taken from traps.
descEnhanced: Gain immunity to the Slow Effects and DMG taken from traps.

name: Magic Magazine
desc: When reloading, there is a 33% chance of not consuming reserve ammo and +30% weapon DMG for the reloaded magazine.
descEnhanced: When reloading, there is a 33% chance not to consume reserve ammo, replenishment equivalent to the magazine capacity is added into reserve ammo, and +30% weapon DMG for the reloaded magazine

name: Genesis
desc: When shooting, there is a 20% chance to add extra ammo into the magazine.
descEnhanced: When shooting, there is a 30% chance to add extra ammo into the magazine.

name: Rock-Hard Determination
desc: +50% DMG while being stationary. (Gradually decreases to 0% over 4s)
descEnhanced: +80% DMG while being stationary; the bonus will remain for 4s after moving.

name: Persistent
desc: +0.5% DMG Resistance for every 1% HP missing.
descEnhanced: +0.8% DMG Resistance for every 1% total HP missing.

name: Abnormal Speed
desc: +3% Movement Speed for every 10% Shield/Armor you currently have.
descEnhanced: +5% Movement Speed for every 10% total HP you currently have.

name: Mid-Air Strike
desc: +50% DMG Dealt while in the air.
descEnhanced: +50% Weapon and skill DMG and -90% DMG taken while in mid-air.

name: Advanced Joggers
desc: -50% Dash cooldown.
descEnhanced: -50% Dash cooldown, and has a 33% chance to reset Dash cooldown while using it.

name: Bullet Bank
desc: All picked up ammo will automatically convert to the currently equipped weapons type.
descEnhanced: All picked up ammo will automatically convert to the currently equipped weapon's type, and gain 3 copper.

name: Gourmet
desc: Buns now recover full HP.
descEnhanced: Buns now recover full HP, and +50 Max Shield/Armor for 20s.

name: Casual Gunsmanship
desc: +20% Luck Shot Chance, but -20% weapon DMG when you don't make a Lucky Shot.
descEnhanced: +20% Lucky Shot Chance, and there is still a 20% chance to inflict a crit hit if you don't hit weak spots.

name: Elemental Torment
desc: +20% Lucky Shot Chance against enemies affected by Elemental Effect.
descEnhanced: +20% Lucky Shot Chance against enemies under an elemental effect; There's a 20% chance to apply an elemental effect when hitting an enemy not affected by any elemental effect.

name: Brief Respite
desc: Gain immunity to all DMG for 1s after swapping weapons or reloading. (Cooldown: 2s)
descEnhanced: Gain immunity to all DMG for 0.5s after swapping weapons.

name: Berserk Soul
desc: +0.5% Lucky Shot Chance for each 1% HP missing.
descEnhanced: +1% Lucky Shot Chance for every 1% total HP missing.

name: Evil-Banishing Talisman
desc: Gain immunity to all Cursed Scrolls.
descEnhanced: Gain immunity to all Cursed Scrolls, and your Cursed Scrolls become discardable.

name: Ammo Recoverer
desc: Get 1 random ammo for every 1 meter traveled.
descEnhanced: Get 1 ammo of each weapon type for every 1m traveled.

name: Evil-Devouring Sword
desc: For every cursed scroll you own, +20% Weapon and Skill DMG.
descEnhanced: For every cursed scroll you own, +40% Weapon and Skill DMG, +20% Lucky Shot Chance.

name: Abundant Vitality
desc: +75% total Weapon DMG while Shield/Armor is recovering. +75% total DMG for the next shot when Shield/Armor is fully recovered.
descEnhanced: +75% total Weapon DMG while Shield/Armor is recovering, and Shield recovery won't be interrupted. +75% total DMG for the next shot when Shield/Armor is fully recovered.

name: Against the Flow
desc: Recover 15% ammo to the magazine every second for 4s after dealing DMG to an enemy. When the effect ends, instead lose 1 random type ammo from reserves every second.
descEnhanced: Recover 15% ammo to the magazine every second for 4s after dealing DMG to an enemy.

name: Fast-Loader
desc: After swapping weapons, replenish the magazine instantly and +30% Lucky Shot Chance. (Gradually decreases to 0% over 3s)
descEnhanced: Fill the magazine instantly after swapping weapons. Your first 3 shots receive +30% Lucky Shot Chance and won't consume ammo. (Gradually decreases to 0% over 3s)

name: Skateboarder
desc: Fill the magazine instantly after dashing.
descEnhanced: Fill the magazine instantly after dashing, and shooting won't consume ammo for the next 2s.

name: Fire Enthusiast
desc: When you are in Burning Effect, Fire DMG will recover 20% lost Total HP (CD: 0.5s). Whenever you inflict the Burning effect to enemies also inflict Burning on yourself (take continuous DMG).
descEnhanced: Fire DMG will recover 20% lost Total HP (CD: 0.5s). Whenever you inflict the Burning effect to enemies also inflict Burning on yourself (take continuous DMG).

name: Corrosion Enthusiast
desc: Whenever you inflict the Decay effect to enemies also inflict Decay on yourself (movement speed -50%). When you are in Decay, +10% DMG Resistance and +40% movement speed.
descEnhanced: +10% DMG Resistance and +40% movement speed. Whenever you inflict the Decay effect to enemies also inflict Decay on yourself (movement speed -50%).

name: Lightning Enthusiast
desc: Whenever you inflict the Shock effect on enemies also inflict Shock on yourself (DMG taken +10%). When you are in Shock, +75% Lightning DMG.
descEnhanced: +75% Lightning DMG. Whenever you inflict the Shock effect to enemies also inflict Shock on yourself (DMG taken +10%).

name: No Retreat
desc: +50% weapon DMG when Secondary Skill count is 0. Persists 12s above 0.
descEnhanced: +50% Weapon DMG when secondary skill count is 0 or primary skill is cooling down. This bonus persists at least 20s.

name: Thunder Screen
desc: Deal lightning DMG to surrounding enemies within 12m when your Shield/Armor breaks. The DMG is affected by your max shield/armor, max HP, and skill DMG.
descEnhanced: Deal lightning DMG to surrounding enemies within 12m when being hit or damaged. The lightning DMG is affected by your max shield/armor, max HP, and skill DMG (trigger up to once per second).

name: Long Shot
desc: Increase weapon DMG when hitting the enemy away from you. The further they are, the larger the bonus (up to 100%).
descEnhanced: Increase weapon DMG when hitting the enemy away from you. The further they are, the larger the bonus (up to 200%).

name: Decay Driver
desc: +20% movement speed for 3s after inflicting decay effect or hurting enemies under decay effect.
descEnhanced: +40% Movement Speed for 5s after inflicting decay effect or hurting enemies under decay effect.

name: Mutual Respect
desc: Grants +15% weapon DMG and +5% DMG Resistance to you for every [Mutual Respect] you and your nearby teammate(s) own. (Only available in multiplayer)
descEnhanced: Grants +15% weapon DMG and +5% DMG Resistance to you for every [Mutual Respect] you and your teammate(s) own.

name: Generosity
desc: Increase the amount of HP recovered from buns by +50%; when picking up/getting buns, all teammates receive 25% of the HP recovered. (Only available in multiplayer)
descEnhanced: Increase the amount of HP recovered from buns by 50%. When you pick up/obtain a bun, all teammates receive 25% of the HP recovered; You receive 25% of HP recovered by teammates when they pick up/obtain buns.

name: Field Support
desc: While the holder is moving, +15% weapon damage for yourself and your teammates within 15m. (Only available in multiplayer)
descEnhanced: While the holder is moving, +30% weapon damage for yourself and your teammates.

name: Hidden Treasure
desc: Breakable objects may drop copper with a lower chance of dropping buns and soul essence when destroyed.
descEnhanced: Breakable objects may drop coppers together with a higher chance of dropping buns and soul essences when destroyed.

name: Wait For Good
desc: First shot after each 10s will deal Crit DMG.
descEnhanced: First shot after each 10s will deal Crit DMG (up to 10 stacks).

name: Extra Surprise
desc: Killing an enemy grants extra copper and extra chance to receive supply for secondary skill.
descEnhanced: Killing an enemy grants extra coppers, and grants extra supply of Secondary Skill uses.

name: Energy Sandals
desc: Dash stacks 24 energy. Using Primary Skill or Secondary Skill consumes all energy and increase Skill DMG. +1% Skill DMG for each energy consumed. (Up to 600 energy can be stacked).
descEnhanced: Dash stacks 24 energy. When energy is stacked, 33% chance to instantly max up stacks. Using Primary Skill or Secondary Skill consumes all energy and increase Skill DMG. +1% Skill DMG for each energy consumed. (Up to 600 energy can be stacked).

name: Skill Booster
desc: Crit Hit stacks 4 energy. Using Primary Skill or Secondary Skill consumes all energy and increase Skill DMG. +1% Skill DMG for each energy consumed. (Up to 500 energy can be stacked).
descEnhanced: Crit Hit stacks 4 energy. When energy is stacked, 33% chance to instantly max up stacks. Using Primary Skill or Secondary Skill consumes all energy and increase Skill DMG. +1% Skill DMG for each energy consumed. (Up to 500 energy can be stacked).

name: Lone Ranger
desc: When not within 12m of a monster, gain +1% Lucky Shot Chance every 0.5s (up to 20 stacks). Lose 1 stack every 0.5s when within 12m of a monster. When at 20 stacks, gain an additional 5% Lucky Shot Chance.
descEnhanced: When there are no monsters within 8 meters, gain 2 stacks every 0.5s (up to 40 stacks). Lose 1 stack every 0.5s otherwise. Gain +1% Lucky Shot Chance per stack, and when at 40 stacks, gain an additional 10% Lucky Shot Chance.

name: Bullet Light
desc: Each shot will consume 1 additional spare ammo, and +25% lucky shot chance. Recover consumed spare ammo when triggering a lucky shot.
descEnhanced: +25% Lucky Shot Chance. Recover one consumed ammo to magazine and reserve upon triggering a lucky shot.

name: Tactical Reload
desc: When reloading, +20% DMG Resistance and +30% movement speed.
descEnhanced: When reloading and for 4s after reloading, +20% DMG Resistance and +30% movement speed.

name: Resilient Life
desc: After taking damage, restore 3% HP per second for 5 seconds.
descEnhanced: After taking DMG, restore 3% HP per second for 5s. (Up to 5 stacks)

name: Effective Split
desc: Randomly get 2 undiscardable Occult Scrolls.
descEnhanced: Randomly get 2 non-discardable Occult Scrolls, and have a 50% chance to obtain Enhanced Occult Scroll.

name: Curiosity Box
desc: Randomly get 1-3 occult scrolls when picking up this scroll. (Extremely small chance of obtaining cursed scrolls)
descEnhanced: Randomly get 1-3 Enhanced Occult Scrolls when picking up this scroll. (Extremely small chance of obtaining cursed scrolls).

name: Good and Evil
desc: +15% Lucky shot chance if you don't own any cursed scroll; +15 max shield/armor for each cursed scroll you own
descEnhanced: +30% Lucky Shot Chance and -30% Dash/Primary Skill cooldown if you don't own any cursed scrolls; +15 max HP and max Shield/Armor for each cursed scroll you own.

name: Sucker Punch
desc: +45% Skill DMG when your skill hits an enemy with more than 70% HP.
descEnhanced: For every 1% total HP of an enemy, +0.7% Skill DMG dealt to it.

name: Enduring Caster
desc: +1% skill DMG for every 5 total max HP you currently have.
descEnhanced: +2% Total Skill DMG for every 5 total HP you currently have.

name: Vindictive Nature
desc: +40% weapon and skill DMG for 10s upon being hit or taking DMG.
descEnhanced: +40% Weapon and Skill DMG for 10s upon being hit or taking DMG, +100% DMG dealt to the enemy who hit you for 10s.

name: 3rd Time Unlucky
desc: +50% Weapon DMG. Obtain 1 Cursed Scroll for every 3 Mysterious Chests you opened. (Cannot be discarded)
descEnhanced: +50% Weapon DMG. Obtain 1 Occult Scroll for every 3 Peculiar Chests you opened. (Cannot be discarded)

name: Normal Ammo
desc: -100% extra ammo of other types when shooting with normal ammo weapons. +30% Weapon DMG for each extra ammo consumed in this shooting.
descEnhanced: -100% extra ammo of other types when shooting with normal ammo weapons. +30% Weapon DMG for each extra ammo consumed in this shooting, +30% chance of a lucky shot for every large ammo consumed, +0.5x CritX for every special ammo consumed.

name: Large Ammo
desc: -100% extra special ammo when shooting with large ammo weapons. +0.5x CritX for each extra ammo consumed in this shooting.
descEnhanced: -200% extra special ammo when shooting with large ammo weapons. +30% Lucky Shot Chance for each large ammo consumed in this shooting, +0.5x CritX for every special ammo consumed.

name: Special Ammo
desc: -400% extra large ammo when shooting with special ammo weapons. +12% Lucky Shot Chance for each extra ammo consumed in this shooting.
descEnhanced: -400% extra large ammo when shooting with special ammo weapons. +12% Lucky Shot Chance for each extra ammo consumed in this shooting, +0.5x CritX for every special ammo consumed.

name: Connected Mind
desc: When using the same weapon type with a teammate, +10% Weapon DMG; when using the same weapon with a teammate, +10% additional Weapon DMG.
descEnhanced: When using the same ammo type with a teammate, +10% Weapon DMG; When using the same weapon type with a teammate, +10% Lucky Shot Chance; when using the same weapon with a teammate, +0.2x CritX.

name: Piercing Bullet
desc: After dealing Weapon DMG to an enemy, +40% Skill DMG against that enemy for 5s.
descEnhanced: +40% Skill DMG enemies taken for 5s after dealing Weapon DMG to enemies.

name: Paranormality
desc: Max HP is fixed at 1, but Max Shield/Armor is doubled.
descEnhanced: Max Shield/Armor gets doubled.

name: Flesh and Bones
desc: Convert Shield/Armor to HP and +4% Max HP/s.
descEnhanced: Convert all Shield/Armor to HP and +4% max HP/s. Increases HP recovery from this scroll by 4% for every 1% HP lost.

name: Lifesaver
desc: When HP is reduced to 0, HP is fixed at 1 for 5s. Killing any enemy within this duration will recover 50% Max HP and 50% Max Shield/Armor. This Occult Scroll is destroyed after triggering once.
descEnhanced: HP is fixed at 1 for 5s when taking lethal DMG, and recovers 50% Max HP and 50% Max Shield/Armor if any enemy is killed during this period (CD 120s).

name: Bloody Ammo
desc: The weapon cannot reload automatically. When the magazine is empty, you can continue to fire, but each extra shot deals DMG to yourself equal to 1% of your total HP.
descEnhanced: The weapon cannot reload automatically. When the magazine is empty, you can continue to fire, but each extra shot deals DMG to yourself equal to 1% of your total HP, gaining +10% Weapon DMG per shot for 5s (up to +100%).

name: Triple Comeback
desc: -50% Max HP and Max Shield/Armor, but gain 2 extra revives. This occult scroll will be destroyed after the effect ends.
descEnhanced: Gain 2 extra revives. This occult scroll will be destroyed after the effect ends.

name: Sanguine Relic
desc: +50% Max HP, -50% DMG Resistance, recover 30% lost Total HP for each hit dealt (CD: 0.5s).
descEnhanced: +50% Max HP, recover 30% lost Total HP for each hit dealt (CD: 0.5s).

name: Giant Slayer
desc: When hitting an enemy, there is a 10% chance to deal 15% of enemy's current HP as True DMG (Up to 2000 DMG per hit).
descEnhanced: When hitting an enemy, there is a 10% chance to deal an additional 15% of the enemy's max HP as True DMG. (5000 gfr-app processed-data process-scraped-html.sh README.md scraped-data tf the number of players in your squad at most per hit)

name: Ninja's Discipline
desc: +5% Lucky Shot Chance per second (up to +50%). Resets after triggering a Lucky Shot.
descEnhanced: +5% Lucky Shot Chance per second (up to 10 stacks). Upon reaching the max stacks, resets after triggering a Lucky Shot.

name: Silver Medal
desc: Your shield starts recharging when you kill an enemy or destroy an item.
descEnhanced: Your shield starts recharging with +50% shield recovery speed when you kill an enemy or destroy an item.

name: Elemental Convergence
desc: +15% Elemental DMG for each nearby enemy with Elemental Effect. (Up to +75%)
descEnhanced: +15% Elemental DMG for each nearby enemy with Elemental Effect.

name: Elemental Weave
desc: Element DMG will always cause an Elemental Effect within 3s after swapping weapons.
descEnhanced: Element DMG will always cause an Elemental Effect within 6s after swapping weapons.

name: Fountain of Life
desc: When picking up copper or ammo, recover 1 HP, or increase max HP by 1 for 10s if HP is full.
descEnhanced: When picking up copper or ammo, recover 1 HP and increase max HP by 1 for 10s.

name: Flowing Wind
desc: While moving, the faster you move, the more DMG Resistance you gain. (up to +20%)
descEnhanced: While moving, the faster you move, the more DMG Resistance you gain (up to +20%) and the higher DMG you deal (up to +50% weapon and skill DMG).

name: Deft Hands
desc: Shooting won't consume any ammo for the next 2s after killing an enemy or destroying an item.
descEnhanced: Shooting won't consume any ammo for the next 4s after killing an enemy or destroying an item.

name: Arms Dealer
desc: +10% DMG Resistance and +30% DMG Dealt for 10s whenever you consume 100 ammo.
descEnhanced: +10% DMG Resistance and +30% weapon and skill DMG for 3s whenever you consume 10 ammo.

name: Magic Watch
desc: There's a 33% chance to reset the cooldown every time you use Primary Skill/Dash.
descEnhanced: There is a 33% chance to reset the cooldown of both Dash and Primary Skill when you use either of it.

name: Magnetic Coil
desc: Every 6s release an electromagnetic pulse that deals 350 Lightning DMG and inflicts the Shock effect. +50 Lightning DMG for each ascension level.
descEnhanced: Every 6s and every time you deal a crit hit (CD: 1s), you release an electromagnetic pulse that deals 350 Lightning DMG and inflicts the Shock effect. +50 Lightning DMG for each ascension level.

name: Final Judgment
desc: Weapon attacks instantly kill normal enemies with less than 15% HP remaining or bosses with less than 8% HP remaining.
descEnhanced: Weapon attacks and Hero Skills instantly kill normal enemies and elites with less than 20% HP remaining or bosses with less than 10% HP remaining.

name: Thorny Carapace
desc: Whenever an enemy hits you release a spike that deals Corrosive DMG to them. DMG is affected by max shields/armor, max HP and skill DMG.
descEnhanced: Whenever an enemy hits you release 2 spikes that deals Corrosive DMG to them. DMG is affected by max shields/armor, max HP and skill DMG.

name: Coin Shot
desc: +30% Lucky Shot Chance by consuming 2 copper when you land a shot. Copper spent will be refunded if you successfully trigger a Lucky Shot.
descEnhanced: Consume two coins on each hit with +60% total weapon DMG (Can't be triggered when you don't have any copper). Killing an enemy in 5 hits refunds all Copper spent on the enemy. Triggering a Crit Hit/Lucky Shot/Elemental Effect does not consume any copper.

name: Propulsion Device
desc: Dash skill has 3 Charges.
descEnhanced: Dash skill has 3 charges and its distance is increased by 3m.

name: Copper Miner
desc: All enemies dead within 7 meters drop 2x the basic reward.
descEnhanced: All enemies dead within 15m drop 2x the basic reward, within 7m drop 3x the basic reward.

name: Veteran
desc: +1 Max HP for each enemy you kill within 7 meters.
descEnhanced: +1 Max Shield/Armor for each enemy you kill within 7 meters.

name: Elite Assassin
desc: +10% DMG Dealt for each elite or boss you defeated or assisted in defeating
descEnhanced: +10% DMG Dealt for each elite or boss you defeated or assisted in defeating in the entire run.

name: Reinforced Eggshell
desc: +15% DMG Resistance when your Shield/Armor is not 0; -15% DMG Resistance when your Shield/Armor is 0.
descEnhanced: +15% DMG Resistance when your Shield/Armor is not 0.

name: Strategic Advantage
desc: +40% Movement Speed for 3s after using a Dash.
descEnhanced: +40% Movement Speed and RoF for 3 s after using Dash.

name: Shrine of Recovery
desc: After not taking damage for 5s, regenerate 5% max HP per second. Regeneration stops when taking damage, with a maximum of 50% HP regenerated per instance.
descEnhanced: After not taking damage for 5s, regenerate 5% max HP per second. Even when taking damage, the regeneration continued for an additional 5s.

name: Ostrich Rider
desc: +50% Movement Speed, +300% Dash Cooldown.
descEnhanced: +60% Movement Speed.

name: Blazing Hoop
desc: Every 6s release a flame pulse that deals 350 Fire DMG and inflicts the Burning effect. +50 Fire DMG for each ascension level.
descEnhanced: Every 6s and every time you deal a crit hit (CD: 1s), release a flame pulse that deals 350 Fire DMG and inflicts the Burning effect. +50 Fire DMG for each ascension level.

name: Realm of Corrosion
desc: Every 6s release a corrosive pulse that deals 350 Corrosion DMG and inflicts the Decay effect. +50 Corrosion DMG for each ascension level.
descEnhanced: Every 6s and every time you deal a crit hit (CD: 1s), release a corrosive pulse that deals 350 Corrosion DMG and inflicts the Decay effect. +50 Corrosion DMG for each ascension level.

name: Flame Shard
desc: Fire damage +25%, and immune to the negative effects of burning effect. The additive effect is doubled while in burning effect.
descEnhanced: Fire damage +75%, and immune to negative effects of burning effect.

name: Lightning Shard
desc: Lightning damage +25%, and immune to the negative effects of shock effect. The additive effect is doubled while in shock effect.
descEnhanced: Lightning damage +75%, and immune to  the negative effects of shock effect.

name: Corrosion Shard
desc: Corrosion damage +25%, and immune to the negative effects of decay effect. The additive effect is doubled while in decay effect.
descEnhanced: Corrosion damage +75%, and immune to  the negative effects of decay effect.

name: Untold Effort
desc: When casting a Secondary Skill, there is a 50% chance to double the consumption and 50% chance to deal double DMG.
descEnhanced: When using the Secondary Skill, there is a 50% chance to not consume any use, and another 50% chance to deal +100% total DMG.

name: Safety Measures
desc: Dashing after being injured recovers 50% of total DMG taken within 1s.
descEnhanced: Dashing after being injured recovers 50% of total DMG taken within 2s.

name: Windrider
desc: After dashing 3 times, gain immunity to All DMG for 2s.
descEnhanced: After dashing 2 times, gain immunity to all DMG for 2s.

name: Capacity Overdraft
desc: The secondary skill can still be used when the number of uses is insufficient, but each use will cause DMG to you.
descEnhanced: The secondary skill can still be used when the number of uses is insufficient, but each use will cause DMG to you and grant +30% skill DMG for 5s. (Up to 5 stacks)

name: Dormant Bullet
desc: The fewer bullets remaining in the magazine, the higher the Weapon DMG (up to +75%).
descEnhanced: The fewer bullets remaining in the magazine, the higher the Weapon DMG (up to +75%). When remaining magazine ammo is no higher than 10% (or just 2), recover 10% magazine ammo (at least 1) every second.

name: Thunder Step
desc: After dashing, cast a lightning bolt at your previous position, dealing DMG to nearby enemies and temporarily imprisoning them.
descEnhanced: After dashing, cast a lightning bolt on the 3 closest enemies within 25m, dealing DMG and temporarily imprisoning them.

name: Explosive Bullets
desc: Weapons will cause an additional explosion upon shooting, dealing DMG equivalent to 50% Weapon DMG (CD: 2s).
descEnhanced: Weapons will cause an additional explosion upon shooting, dealing DMG equivalent to 100% Weapon DMG (CD: 1s).

name: Fight for Immortality
desc: Upon taking DMG, gain additional max Shield/Armor for 12s, equivalent to the DMG received. (CD: 45s)
descEnhanced: Upon taking DMG, gain additional max Shield/Armor for 25s, equivalent to the DMG received. (CD: 25s)

name: Hidden Transaction
desc: There's a 33% chance to enhance a weapon by +1 extra level when enhancing your weapons at a craftsman.
descEnhanced: There’s a 33% chance to enhance a weapon by +1 extra level when enhancing your weapons at a craftsman; +1 total enhancements at the Craftsman.

name: Terrific Crossfire
desc: -1s Primary Skill cooldown upon casting a Secondary Skill.
descEnhanced: -1s Primary Skill cooldown upon casting a Secondary Skill. Every use of Primary Skill recovers 3 uses of Secondary Skill.

name: Surprise Bonus
desc: When dealing Skill DMG, there is a 15% chance to deal +100% total DMG.
descEnhanced: When dealing Skill DMG, there is a 15% chance to deal +100% total DMG, and a 5% chance to deal +200% total DMG.

name: Take It All
desc: You can select all options in a Mysterious Chest. But you can no longer discard scrolls anymore. (cannot be discarded)
descEnhanced: Peculiar Chests offer multiple options (cannot be discarded).

name: Refresh Addict
desc: Merch in the Peddler can be refreshed once more.
descEnhanced: Merch in the Peddler and Phantom Peddler can be refreshed once more.

name: Ancient Timer
desc: -50% Primary Skill cooldown. 3s cooldown for secondary skill.
descEnhanced: -50% Primary Skill cooldown.

name: Glazed Sight
desc: +1.5x CritX. After taking DMG to HP 50 times from enemies or traps, the bonus lowers to +0.5x. (Cannot be discarded)
descEnhanced: +0.5x CritX. For every 10% HP you have, +0.1x CritX.

name: Rational Consumption
desc: +80% Skill DMG. Every time you purchase from the Peddler, lose 5% Skill DMG. (Will not drop below 0%. Scroll cannot be discarded)
descEnhanced: +80% Skill DMG. Every time you interact with the Peddler, gain 10% Skill DMG. Every time you purchase from the Peddler, lose 5% Skill DMG. (Will not drop below 0%. Scroll cannot be discarded)

name: Nirvana Force
desc: While knocked down, deals damage to enemies within an 8m radius per second (damage increases with lower max HP); +15% teammates movement speed and -30% revive time.
descEnhanced: No Down Penalty while knocked down. While knocked down, deals damage to enemies within an 8m radius per second (damage increases with lower max HP); +15% teammates movement speed and -30% revive time.

name: Concurrent Cooldown
desc: -10% magazine ammo per second and gains a stack after reloading. Each stack +10% weapon damage (up to 100%). Stops consuming when the magazine is less than or equal to 50% or has 1 round left. Stacks reset after reloading.
descEnhanced: After reloading, consume 10% of the magazine ammo to gain a stack. Each stack increases weapon damage by 10% (up to a maximum of 200%). Stacks reset after reloading.

name: Overflowing Waters
desc: Consume all when secondary skill count reaches the upper limit. +10% Weapon DMG for each charge consumed (last for 20s).
descEnhanced: Using secondary skill will consume all of the secondary skill count. +10% Weapon DMG for each charge consumed (last for 20s).

name: Blessing in Disguise
desc: Ascension options are fixed at 2. You have 3 chances to select both Ascension options.
descEnhanced: Ascension options are fixed at 2. You have 5 chances to select both Ascension options.

name: Lucky Roulette
desc: Change the Max copper owned to 9876. When switching stages, change the highest digit of the copper to 1, and then randomly permute the digits.
descEnhanced: Change the Max copper owned to 9876. When switching stages, change the smallest digit of the copper to 9, and then randomly permute the digits.

name: Intimidating Presence
desc: Defeating an enhanced monster inflicts Manipulation Effect on all monsters within a 7m radius of the defeated monster.
descEnhanced: Defeating an enhanced monster inflicts Manipulation Effect on all monsters within a 7m radius of yourself and the defeated monster.

name: Coins of Life
desc: Consume all copper when picking up this scroll. It protects from lethal damage once and would be destroyed afterwards.
